      • decrypt

        java.lang.String decrypt(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
                         byte[] message)
                  throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                         javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                         javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The private key used.
        message - The message that is being decrypted.
        Returns:
        The decrypted message, encoded in UTF-8.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException

      • encrypt

        byte[] encrypt(java.security.PublicKey publicKey,
               java.lang.String message)
        throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
               javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
               javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The public key to use.
        message - The message that is being encrypted.
        Returns:
        The encrypted message, encoded in UTF-8.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
